allowLocationDesc: To access information about the nearest pharmacy, you need to allow location access.
allowLocationDeniedDesc: To access information about the nearest pharmacy, you need to allow location access. You can enable location services by going to your browser settings.
pharmacyWorkingTimeDesc: This page lists the on-duty pharmacies that are open all day on {{currentDate}}, and until {{nextDay}} morning.

openSourceDesc: This project is an open-source project. You can see the details on the GitHub page.
